label: ham
subject: Re: Debian GNU/Linux (kfreebsd anyone?) Lenny Desktop wishlist thread
body: 91 (return) [ One of these, Anatolius, perished in an earthquake—doubtless a judgment! The complaints and clamors of the people in Agathias (l. v. p. 146, 147) are almost an echo of the anecdote. The aliena pecunia reddenda of Corippus (l. ii. 381, &c.,) is not very honorable to Justinian’s memory.]
